Producer: Dede Gardner, Jeremy Kleiner, Frances McDormand
Production Co: Plan B Entertainment, Orion Pictures, Hear/Say Productions
Rating: PG-13 (Mature Thematic Content|Bloody Images|Sexual Assault|Some Strong Language)
Synopsis: Do nothing. Stay and fight. Or leave. In 2010, the women of an isolated religious community grapple with reconciling a brutal reality with their faith.
Title: Women Talking
